Class JPEG2000FPE

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elte.cs.crypto.fpe.algorithms.JPEG2000FPE

  • public class JPEG2000FPE
extends java.lang.Object
    Format preserving encryption for JPEG 2000 files.
